desc: When duty calls and it's time to rise, OD:30 boots are built for the challenge. Our footwear is designed using United States military purchase descriptions as our guiding principles. Boots built by OD:30 are free from gimmicks, imitations and fluff. You're getting quality, durability and comfort - that's it.

layout.text: When duty calls and it's time to rise, OD:30 boots are built for the challenge.
